name: An Unexpected Mishap in Naval Mine Cove
name_original: An Unexpected Mishap in Naval Mine Cove
description:
We recommend using full screen or Downloading the Windows build for best experience.

Use WASD to move. S to use the red boiler valves.

UH OH! An unexpected mishap has occurred in Naval Mine Cove and your ship is sinking fast! Hop around your Submarine and use the boiler valves to steer your sub and bail water out of your hull.

Created by Nathan Shepherd and Beatrix Bumpbell

Music by Logan Felber

Made for Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam.
